name: Crategun
summary:
Made for the Opera GX Game Jam

Aliens are attacking oceans by flooding them with boxes. Without any connection with the center, you find yourself in the ocean, endlessly destroying tons of hazardous boxes and your only goal is to stop the flooding no matter what. The boxes contain various weapons, which you will have to figure out how to use.

Gain points by opening the blue boxes with weapons. Avoid touching the water. The difficulty increases with time. Good luck, machine!
